title: Hairdresser screams with terror as rampaging deer smashes its way into her salon
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

A hairdresser was left screaming with shock after a rampaging deer broke through her salon window and ran amok inside.

The stylist screeched: ‘Oh my God! Oh My God!’ after the wild animal broke through the plate glass window of Be.you.tiful Hair Salon in Lake Ronkonkoma, New York, on Saturday afternoon.

She was giving a male customer a haircut at the time, but quickly stepped away from the deer.

It also managed to injure a woman sitting on a sofa beside the wrecked window.

The stylist, who wasn’t named, instructed an unseen staff member to close the back door of the salon.

A hair stylist was left screaming in fright after a deer crashed through the front window of her salon while she was cutting a customer’s hair (Picture: Be.you.tiful Hair Salon)

Seconds later, the deer made its exit by bashing through the salon’s front door, causing further damage.

The woman struck by the deer suffered minor leg and head pain as a result, and was taken to a local hospital.

Police were called to the scene – although the deer was long gone by the time they showed up, WABC reported.
